sub _default
A catch-all routine for otherwise unhandled events that POE might see.
sub cmd_exists_in_db
Checks if a command already exists in the table of commands
sub command_bind
Binds a command from IRC to a subroutine in a module
sub delete
Deletes a key from object and database, if it exists.
sub DESTROY
Disconnects a database-handle when it goes out of scope.
sub do_autoping()
Called by the POE-kernel when there has been no traffic for 300 seconds.
sub do_connect()
Initiates a connection to the IRC-server through the previously defined IRC-object
sub do_reconnect()
Called when a connection is dropped and needs to be re-established.
sub dummy
Do I really need to do this?
sub empty_db
Empty the configuration database.
sub exists
Checks if a configuration key have been set (exists in the configuration table)
sub get
Get the value of a key.
sub key_exists_in_db
Private pendant to exists.
sub new
Generate a new configuration-object
sub new
Instance-method that return a plain database-handle
sub on_ctcp_finger
Technically supposed to be a finger-implementation but that’s boring, so respond with a rude remark instead.
sub on_ctcp_ping
Event callback called by POE when a CTCP PING is recieved.
sub on_ctcp_time
Event callback called by POE when a CTCP TIME is recieved.
sub on_ctcp_version
Event callback called by POE when a CTCP VERSION is recieved.
sub on_ctcpreply_ping
Event callback called by POE when a CTCP PING reply is recieved.
sub on_ctcpreply_version
Event callback called by POE when a CTCP VERSION reply is recieved.
sub parse_configfile
Parses a configuration file and updates config-table with new keys and values.
sub set
Sets a given key to a given value
sub sync
Synchronizes an older version of Anna’s database to the current version.
sub toggle
Toggles a boolean value (set it to zero if it’s one and vice-versa)
sub update_db
Updates database with changes configuration values.
